function.name: synthesize_collected_information
function.description: Use this tool when you have collected information from the results of calling other tools, and you want to carefully consider the collected information and synthesize it either to create a cohesive response or come to a decision.

synthesized_information.description: Your thought process for synthesizing the collected information and your final synthesized response or decision

function.name: math
function.description: Use this when you need to do math.

input.description: Describe the math problem, describe your thinking process, and then describe the solution you arrive at.
